mapper.update: MERGE INTO BODY_CHECK_LIST A USING ( SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AS CHECK_NO ,'${B001}' AS B001 ,'${B002}' AS B002 ,'${B003}' AS B003 ,'${B004}' AS B004 ,'${B005}' AS B005 ,'${B006}' AS B006 ,'${B007}' AS B007 ,'${B008}' AS B008 ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD hhmmss') AS REG_DT ,'${RMK}' AS RMK FROM DUAL ) B ON (A.CHECK_NO = B.CHECK_NO) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.B001 = B.B001 ,A.B002 = B.B002 ,A.B003 = B.B003 ,A.B004 = B.B004 ,A.B005 = B.B005 ,A.B006 = B.B006 ,A.B007 = B.B007 ,A.B008 = B.B008 ,A.REG_DT = B.REG_DT ,A.RMK = B.RMK WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (A.CHECK_NO, A.B001, A.B002, A.B003, A.B004, A.B005, A.B006, A.B007, A.B008, A.REG_DT, A.RMK) VALUES (B.CHECK_NO, B.B001, B.B002, B.B003, B.B004, B.B005, B.B006, B.B007, B.B008, B.REG_DT, B.RMK)
